Body: Hello could someone advice me a software to log all incoming and outgoing calls and text messages might be ever more options i have tried SMS Tracker application but its really easy to detect , i mean there always is a status bar witch tells that "SMS tracker is activated " i need a program that will be hidden and my kids wont know that i am spying on them , could someone advice my some kind of software , basically i need just call and text messages but would be good if there is even more options to track
Title: TEXT Message , Call, logger

history.Text: Hello could someone advice me a software to log all incoming and outgoing calls and text messages might be ever more options i have tried SMS Tracker application but its really easy to detect , i mean there always is a status bar witch tells that "SMS tracker is activated " i need a program that will be hidden and my kids wont know that i am spying on them , could someone advice my some kind of software , basically i need just call and text messages but would be good if there is even more options to track
